title: Hanasaku Iroha – The Place That Blooms Someday - Novel Updates
tags: Determined Protagonist   Family Business   Friendship   Heartwarming   Lack of Common Sense   Modern Day   Sharp-tongued Characters
author: Fujimoto Tohru
description: The book's story is set seven years after the closure of Kissuisō at the end of the television anime. Ohana, who 'wants to become Sui Shijima,' shows her determination to revive the hot spring inn. Leaving her Tokyo life behind again, she reunites as an adult with those she once knew and meets new people who may help to bring Kissuisō back to life.>
